original_title: Still Tickin': The Return of 'A Clockwork Orange'
overview: Produced by Channel 4, Still Tickin´: The Return of A Clockwork Orange examines the controversy over Kubrick’s iconic film, explaining the film’s “demonic level of attention,” and its influence on culture, politics and society, which led to the director’s self-imposed ban.
title: Still Tickin': The Return of 'A Clockwork Orange'
